It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.

profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

In a riveting fireside chat with Raj Nandwani, Head of Global Business Development atBinance, we delved into the topic "Traditional Finance and the Intersection of the New Digital Assets Frontier." 

Our dialogue highlighted the transformative role of stablecoins like#FDUSDin succession planning and wealth protection within the Web 3 landscape, providing a secure method to manage and secure wealth in an increasingly digital-first economy.

Day 1 set a high bar with a panel discussion on "Unlocking Value and Stablecoin Adoption in Asia," where I had the honor of sharing the stage with thought leaders in the industry. Moderated byBinance's Global Head of Sanctions, we engaged in deep discussions alongsideLucy Gazmararian, Founder & Managing Partner ofToken Bay Capital, andSinan Kocç, CEO ofBiLira.

Together, we discussed how#stablecoinscan co-exist with central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) to power the financial infrastructure of Web 2.5 through to 3.0. The dialogue opened up perspectives on the power of consumer choice in the future of currency. 

The spotlight on stablecoins is brighter than ever, especially considering their expanding use cases, from streamlining payroll, payments, to banking the unbanked. It is also clear that the conversation around regulatory frameworks for stablecoins is just as crucial as their development and the need for a balanced approach that foster#innovationwhile ensuring security and#trustin the system.#FDUSD#BinanceBlockchainWeek#CBDC#FinancialInclusion#Regulation#Asia

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

We are pleased to learn about the listing of $FDUSD byFlipster, another exchange that might be of interest to our community. $FDUSD is now being accepted as a deposit option onFlipsterso that users can now easily fund their Flipster wallets with our#stablecoin.#FDUSD, backed by First Digital's robust reserves, provides stability and security, making it an ideal choice for users looking for a reliable fiat-backed digital asset. 3,279 followers First Digital USD (FDUSD) is a new USD-pegged stablecoin byFirst Digital. Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Thank you once again toBinancefor having us participate in a well attended, and well organised conference. CEO at First Digital Trust Day 2 atBinanceBlockchain Week Istanbul!

Thrilled to take the stage to introduceFirst Digitaland our flagship#FDUSD- the largest#stablecoinin Asia, and developed out of#Hongkong.

In a riveting fireside chat with Raj Nandwani, Head of Global Business Development atBinance, we delved into the topic "Traditional Finance and the Intersection of the New Digital Assets Frontier." 

Our dialogue highlighted the transformative role of stablecoins like#FDUSDin succession planning and wealth protection within the Web 3 landscape, providing a secure method to manage and secure wealth in an increasingly digital-first economy.

With Hong Kong's drive to become a global#Web3hub, it's an exciting time for FDT to collaborate with regulators HKMA on pioneering FDUSD applications, ensuring transparent governance and meticulous product stewardship.

A heartfelt thank you toBinancefor the opportunity, and I eagerly anticipate our continued dialogue into 2024.#FDUSD#BinanceBlockchainWeek#DigitalAssets#Innovation#WealthProtection

What a successful first day of riveting discussions lead by our very own Vincent Chok on a topic that is not going away anytime soon,#stablecoins.

It was great to see Vincent take the stage at such a prestigious conference and with high calibre industry insiders such as Lucy and Sinan, who both shared a lot of interesting insights around stable digital currencies 👏 CEO at First Digital Trust Engaging Week atBinanceBlockchain Week in Istanbul!

Day 1 set a high bar with a panel discussion on "Unlocking Value and Stablecoin Adoption in Asia," where I had the honor of sharing the stage with thought leaders in the industry. Moderated byBinance's Global Head of Sanctions, we engaged in deep discussions alongsideLucy Gazmararian, Founder & Managing Partner ofToken Bay Capital, andSinan Kocç, CEO ofBiLira.

Together, we discussed how#stablecoinscan co-exist with central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) to power the financial infrastructure of Web 2.5 through to 3.0. The dialogue opened up perspectives on the power of consumer choice in the future of currency. 

The spotlight on stablecoins is brighter than ever, especially considering their expanding use cases, from streamlining payroll, payments, to banking the unbanked. Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Both cities have robust financial infrastructures, no capital controls and good public private partnership and these elements will help the#digitalassetmarket thrive.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. First Digitalis pleased to announce that#FDUSDwill be integrated into theSui Foundationnetwork, becoming the ecosystem’s first native 1:1 stablecoin.

Marrying the innovation of DeFi with the trust and stability of First Digital's stablecoins, this partnership marks a significant milestone in the expansion of FDUSD into the thriving Sui DeFi ecosystem, with Sui becoming the first network FDUSD has expanded to since its inception.

The partnership between First Digital and Sui is a strategic alliance aimed at enhancing liquidity and efficiency of transactions, continuing to bridge traditional finance to the ever-expanding digital economy.

Sui will be the first chain FDUSD has expanded to since its inception in June 2023. 

FDUSD has a market cap of $3.4 billion, and has seen the fifth-highest trading volume across the industry, including $8 billion of volume in a single day.Vincent Chok, CEO atFirst Digital, will be onstage at#SuiBasecamptomorrow at 10:30 a.m. CET to share more details about this historic moment.

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

We are pleased to learn about the listing of $FDUSD byFlipster, another exchange that might be of interest to our community. $FDUSD is now being accepted as a deposit option onFlipsterso that users can now easily fund their Flipster wallets with our#stablecoin.#FDUSD, backed by First Digital's robust reserves, provides stability and security, making it an ideal choice for users looking for a reliable fiat-backed digital asset. 3,440 followers First Digital USD (FDUSD) is a new USD-pegged stablecoin byFirst Digital. Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Thrilled to take the stage to introduceFirst Digitaland our flagship#FDUSD- the largest#stablecoinin Asia, and developed out of#Hongkong.

In a riveting fireside chat with Raj Nandwani, Head of Global Business Development atBinance, we delved into the topic "Traditional Finance and the Intersection of the New Digital Assets Frontier." 

Our dialogue highlighted the transformative role of stablecoins like#FDUSDin succession planning and wealth protection within the Web 3 landscape, providing a secure method to manage and secure wealth in an increasingly digital-first economy.

What a successful first day of riveting discussions lead by our very own Vincent Chok on a topic that is not going away anytime soon,#stablecoins.

It was great to see Vincent take the stage at such a prestigious conference and with high calibre industry insiders such as Lucy and Sinan, who both shared a lot of interesting insights around stable digital currencies 👏 CEO at First Digital Trust Engaging Week atBinanceBlockchain Week in Istanbul!

Day 1 set a high bar with a panel discussion on "Unlocking Value and Stablecoin Adoption in Asia," where I had the honor of sharing the stage with thought leaders in the industry. Moderated byBinance's Global Head of Sanctions, we engaged in deep discussions alongsideLucy Gazmararian, Founder & Managing Partner ofToken Bay Capital, andSinan Kocç, CEO ofBiLira.

Together, we discussed how#stablecoinscan co-exist with central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) to power the financial infrastructure of Web 2.5 through to 3.0. The dialogue opened up perspectives on the power of consumer choice in the future of currency. 

The spotlight on stablecoins is brighter than ever, especially considering their expanding use cases, from streamlining payroll, payments, to banking the unbanked. It is also clear that the conversation around regulatory frameworks for stablecoins is just as crucial as their development and the need for a balanced approach that foster#innovationwhile ensuring security and#trustin the system.#FDUSD#BinanceBlockchainWeek#CBDC#FinancialInclusion#Regulation#Asia

First Digitalreposted this CEO at First Digital Trust AtFirst Digital, we are keeping a close eye on the banking and#paymentsinfrastructure in Singapore so that we can better serve our clients.

We are currently in the process of applying for a payments license from the MAS in Singapore so that we can provide a full suite of services that complement our existing core#custodybusiness. We recognise that Singapore's banking#infrastructureis sophisticated and we want to be able to leverage that to solve some of the pain points our existing and potential clients are facing.

I truly believe that#Asiais primed for real growth and maturation of the industry. Hong Kong and Singapore are well positioned to capitalise on a huge opportunity to become the top Fintech/crypto hubs globally. Both cities have robust financial infrastructures, no capital controls and good public private partnership and these elements will help the#digitalassetmarket thrive.

Thanks toClaire Huangat theThe Straits Timesfor the feature. Read the full article here:https://lnkd.in/gXrzUmsZ

“We're living in... it's 2023, right? We're going into 2024. You can send a movie and you can stream a movie within seconds. You can send photos within seconds. We live in a world where information travels almost instantaneously. And yet, it still takes so long for value to transfer. That's why the traditional financial services industry is an industry that's – I don't want to say ripe for disruption – but ripe for evolution, because it really hasn't evolved."

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

Our CEO Vincent Chok was hard at work over the weekend, guest lecturing at one ofHenri Arslanian's many classes at HKU. 

We are witnessing the evolution of education in the digital era. 💼💻 As we look ahead, we predict a significant shift in student courses, with a greater emphasis on#digitalassetsand#cryptocurrenciesin the future. 💡💰

🌐 The rapid growth and widespread adoption of digital assets have transformed the financial landscape. As a forward-thinking firm, we recognize the importance of equipping the next generation with the knowledge and skills necessary to navigate this dynamic environment. CEO at First Digital Trust Over the weekend, I had the privilege of guest lecturing in one ofHenri Arslanian's guest lectures at HKU, sharing insights on the evolving landscape of trust and digital assets custody. The session was a deep dive into the critical role trust plays in the adoption and management of#digitalassets. We explored the pioneering solutions making waves in the industry and discussed the challenges that lie ahead.
 
With digital assets becoming increasingly integral to our financial systems, the importance of secure and reliable custody solutions cannot be understated. It was inspiring to engage with a group of bright minds eager to push the boundaries of what's possible in#fintech.
 
A special thanks toHenri Arslanianfor the invitation and to the students for their thoughtful questions and engagement.#DigitalAssets#Custody#Blockchain#Innovation#Finance#Education

We are pleased to learn about the listing of $FDUSD byFlipster, another exchange that might be of interest to our community. $FDUSD is now being accepted as a deposit option onFlipsterso that users can now easily fund their Flipster wallets with our#stablecoin.#FDUSD, backed by First Digital's robust reserves, provides stability and security, making it an ideal choice for users looking for a reliable fiat-backed digital asset. 3,591 followers First Digital USD (FDUSD) is a new USD-pegged stablecoin byFirst Digital. Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Day 1 set a high bar with a panel discussion on "Unlocking Value and Stablecoin Adoption in Asia," where I had the honor of sharing the stage with thought leaders in the industry. Moderated byBinance's Global Head of Sanctions, we engaged in deep discussions alongsideLucy Gazmararian, Founder & Managing Partner ofToken Bay Capital, andSinan Kocç, CEO ofBiLira.

Together, we discussed how#stablecoinscan co-exist with central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) to power the financial infrastructure of Web 2.5 through to 3.0. The dialogue opened up perspectives on the power of consumer choice in the future of currency. 

The spotlight on stablecoins is brighter than ever, especially considering their expanding use cases, from streamlining payroll, payments, to banking the unbanked. It is also clear that the conversation around regulatory frameworks for stablecoins is just as crucial as their development and the need for a balanced approach that foster#innovationwhile ensuring security and#trustin the system.#FDUSD#BinanceBlockchainWeek#CBDC#FinancialInclusion#Regulation#Asia

We are currently in the process of applying for a payments license from the MAS in Singapore so that we can provide a full suite of services that complement our existing core#custodybusiness. We recognise that Singapore's banking#infrastructureis sophisticated and we want to be able to leverage that to solve some of the pain points our existing and potential clients are facing.

I truly believe that#Asiais primed for real growth and maturation of the industry. Hong Kong and Singapore are well positioned to capitalise on a huge opportunity to become the top Fintech/crypto hubs globally. Both cities have robust financial infrastructures, no capital controls and good public private partnership and these elements will help the#digitalassetmarket thrive.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts into different themes related to cryptocurrency (e.g., regulation, technological advancements, market predictions). Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts can be categorized into three themes: partnerships, new listings, and educational initiatives. They emphasize legitimate business growth in the cryptocurrency market, avoiding manipulative schemes and aggressive investor behavior, and are likely bot-generated due to their repetitive structure and frequent use of hashtags.

prompts_output.Prompt: Assess these posts for insights into investor behavior, concerns, and expectations regarding cryptocurrencies. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Investors prioritize stability, transparency, and education in cryptocurrencies, favoring legitimate growth and credible partnerships. They avoid manipulative schemes and aggressive tactics, valuing informed decision-making and regulatory compliance for a trustworthy market environment.

prompts_output.Prompt: Spot any emerging trends in topics discussed in these posts about the company. Are there any new developments, controversies, or milestones that are garnering attention? Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Emerging trends include Tether's USD₮ expansion, crypto-payment collaborations, and educational initiatives in Ras Al Khaimah, with key developments in digital finance and regulation in Georgia. No new controversies or major milestones are noted.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify any patterns or strategies in these posts that resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics such as pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts do not resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics like pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. They focus on legitimate business growth, exhibit bot-like characteristics, and lack promotion of rapid price increases or guaranteed returns.

prompts_output.Prompt: Analyze these posts to determine if any show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts exhibit characteristics of being generated by bots due to their repetitive structure, frequent use of hashtags, and promotional content with links, indicating automation rather than personal engagement.

prompts_output.Prompt: Examine these posts for the presence of invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups, and assess their potential role in manipulation schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts lack invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups and focus on partnerships, new listings, and educational initiatives, indicating they are for legitimate business growth rather than manipulation schemes.

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts based on their content and topics, focusing on how they relate to cryptocurrency market trends and investor behavior. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts fall into three categories: partnerships, new listings, and educational initiatives. They emphasize legitimate growth, transparency, and education in the cryptocurrency market, avoiding manipulative practices, and are likely bot-generated due to their repetitive structure and frequent use of hashtags.

overall_prompt_summary:
The posts are likely generated by bots, focusing on legitimate business growth such as partnerships and educational initiatives, without signs of manipulation tactics like pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. They exhibit repetitive structures, frequent use of hashtags, and promotional content with links, indicating automation rather than personal engagement.

The most important issues are the lack of personal engagement and the repetitive, automated nature of the posts. Additionally, the posts do not aggressively promote rapid price increases or guaranteed returns, which is a positive sign.

To improve, incorporating more personalized and engaging content could enhance the authenticity and effectiveness of the posts.

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.

prompts_output.Output:

prompts_output.Prompt: Spot any emerging trends in topics discussed in these posts about the company. Are there any new developments, controversies, or milestones that are garnering attention? Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify any patterns or strategies in these posts that resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics such as pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts focus on partnerships, compliance, and education without misleading hype, false promises, or aggressive recruitment, lacking any patterns or strategies resembling known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics like pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes.

prompts_output.Prompt: Analyze these posts to determine if any show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts lack personal touches, use repetitive promotional language, and include multiple links, which are common characteristics of bot-generated content. However, without additional context, this is not definitive.

prompts_output.Prompt: Examine these posts for the presence of invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups, and assess their potential role in manipulation schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts do not contain invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups and focus on partnerships, compliance, and education. There is no evidence suggesting their role in manipulation schemes.

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts based on their content and topics, focusing on how they relate to cryptocurrency market trends and investor behavior. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Sure, please provide the posts you would like me to categorize.

overall_prompt_summary:
The posts analyzed exhibit characteristics commonly associated with bot-generated content, such as a lack of personal touches, repetitive promotional language, and multiple links. They focus on partnerships, compliance, and education without containing invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups, and there is no evidence of manipulation schemes.

The most important issues are the repetitive promotional language and the absence of personal touches, which make the posts seem impersonal and automated. Additionally, the inclusion of multiple links can be off-putting and may reduce engagement.

To improve, incorporating more personalized content and reducing the number of links could make the posts more engaging and authentic.

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

We recognise that Singapore's banking#infrastructureis sophisticated and we want to be able to leverage that to solve some of the pain points our existing and potential clients are facing.

I truly believe that#Asiais primed for real growth and maturation of the industry. Hong Kong and Singapore are well positioned to capitalise on a huge opportunity to become the top Fintech/crypto hubs globally. Both cities have robust financial infrastructures, no capital controls and good public private partnership and these elements will help the#digitalassetmarket thrive.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts into different themes related to cryptocurrency (e.g., regulation, technological advancements, market predictions). Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts can be categorized into themes of technological advancements, partnerships, and regulatory compliance. They reflect investor priorities such as security, sustainability, and compliance, and exhibit characteristics of bot-generated promotional content without manipulation tactics.

prompts_output.Prompt: Assess these posts for insights into investor behavior, concerns, and expectations regarding cryptocurrencies. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Investors prioritize security, sustainability, and regulatory compliance in the cryptocurrency market, as reflected in posts about technological advancements and partnerships. These posts, likely bot-generated, suggest a focus on promoting stability and trust without manipulation.

prompts_output.Prompt: Spot any emerging trends in topics discussed in these posts about the company. Are there any new developments, controversies, or milestones that are garnering attention? Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Emerging trends include technological advancements, partnerships, and regulatory compliance, focusing on security, sustainability, and compliance. No new developments, controversies, or major milestones are evident.

prompts_output.Prompt: Identify any patterns or strategies in these posts that resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics such as pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts do not exhibit any patterns or strategies resembling cryptocurrency manipulation tactics like pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes; they focus on partnerships, technological advancements, and compliance without aggressive price promotion, unrealistic profit promises, or recruitment-based incentives.

prompts_output.Prompt: Analyze these posts to determine if any show characteristics of being generated by bots or automated accounts. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts exhibit characteristics of bot-generated content, such as lack of personal engagement, promotional focus, uniformity, and multiple links, indicating they are likely automated rather than authored by humans.

prompts_output.Prompt: Examine these posts for the presence of invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups, and assess their potential role in manipulation schemes. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts lack invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups and show no signs of manipulation schemes like pump-and-dump or Ponzi tactics, focusing instead on partnerships, technological advancements, and compliance.

prompts_output.Prompt: Categorize these posts based on their content and topics, focusing on how they relate to cryptocurrency market trends and investor behavior. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The posts fall into themes of technological advancements, partnerships, and regulatory compliance in the cryptocurrency market, reflecting investor priorities such as security, sustainability, and compliance, and exhibit characteristics of bot-generated promotional content without manipulation tactics.

overall_prompt_summary: The posts are likely bot-generated, focusing on themes such as technological advancements, partnerships, and regulatory compliance. They lack personal engagement and are promotional in nature, with uniformity and multiple links. The most important issues include the absence of personal touch and the heavy promotional focus, which can make the content feel impersonal and automated. Additionally, the uniformity of the posts may reduce their effectiveness in engaging the audience. To improve, incorporating more personalized and varied content could enhance engagement and authenticity.

profile_overview: First Digital is a technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry.
profile_bio: First Digital Trust ("FDT") is Asia’s leading technology-driven financial institution powering the digital asset industry and servicing fintech innovators including blockchain startups, money service businesses and token issuers. The team is behind Abacus rapid settlement network and provides APIs, settlement and clearing, accounting, compliance, fiat gateways, payments rails and open finance infrastructure for the industry.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation CEO at First Digital Trust ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX
