profile_overview: First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions.
profile_bio:
First Digital is your trusted guardian delivering next-generation financial services for global businesses and individuals to thrive in the digital asset economy. 

First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions to businesses, financial institutions and family offices navigating the next frontier in finance.

MULTI-ASSET CUSTODY & SAFEKEEPING
Fortify your treasury operations with First Digital's multi-asset custody solutions—streamlined for global reach, rapid settlement, and a host of value-added services.

STRUCTURED TRUST & ADVISORY 
Unlock a wealth of financial engineering and strategic regulatory expertise with tailored structuring and consulting services.

STABLECOIN SOLUTIONS 
Optimize your financial operations by harnessing the power of our deeply liquid and zero-fee stablecoin portfolio. First Digital is the home of FDUSD, a fully backed stablecoin issued out of Asia. 

PAYMENTS AND SETTLEMENTS
Streamline everyday expenses, cross-border payments and global payroll and enhance your financial fluidity.

WHO WE SERVE
Headquartered in Hong Kong and with a presence in the UK, Middle East, Singapore and Malaysia, First Digital’s clients comprise regulated financial institutions and fintech innovators including blockchain start-ups, money service businesses, token issuers, market makers, digital asset exchanges and family offices. 
 
OUR COMMITMENT TO REGULATORY COMPLIANCE
Fully aligned with Hong Kong’s Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorist Financing Ordinance, First Digital is licensed under the Trust Ordinance Section 8 of Hong Kong, is SOC1 Type 2 and SOC2 Type 2, ISO 27001 Certified as well as FATCA and AEoI Compliant.  

Get in touch for your multi-asset servicing needs: 
https://1stdigital.com/contact-us/

Celebrating a Year of Stability and Growth: First Digital Labs Marks the First Anniversary of its FDUSD Stablecoin

This week we're proud to celebrate the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing fiat-referenced stablecoin which has achieved a remarkable milestone, reaching a market cap high of over $4B USD in less than a year.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has demonstrated robust architecture and has seen growing adoption across the cryptocurrency ecosystem, establishing itself as a liquid, safe and trustworthy stablecoin option within investor's portfolios.

From strategic exchange listings, enhanced utility and expansion into DeFi - it has been an eventful first year of FDUSD.

A Word from our FounderVincent Chok, Founder and CEO of First Digital, stated: "This past year has been phenomenal. We set out to create a trusted stablecoin that bridges traditional finance with Web3 and plays a pivotal role in DeFi. From expansive listings and partnerships, FDUSD's journey reflects our commitment to providing a stable and reliable digital currency. Our vision extends beyond achieving financial milestones. We are committed to spearheading the evolution of digital currency applications. We look forward to the new stablecoin regulatory framework next year, which we believe will foster greater choice, innovation, and use cases in the market."

Looking to the Future
The road ahead for FDUSD is paved with ambitious plans. The team is set on enabling FDUSD on new blockchains, securing additional centralised exchange listings, and expanding use cases in payments, settlements, and remittances. Collaborations with strategic partners will continue to be a priority to enhance the broader distribution and usage of FDUSD.

We extend our heartfelt thanks to our customers, partners, and employees for their support. Founder and CEO at First Digital | FDUSD A Multi Billion-Dollar Journey That Started With Trust.

I am incredibly proud to mark the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing stablecoin, unlocking USD access to millions around the globe. This past year has been an amazing journey of innovation, growth, and success.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has set a new benchmark for stablecoin adoption in Asia Pacific, hitting remarkable milestones like listing on Binance, Bitget and other centralised exchanges, and onto new chains like Sui that help deployment of FDUSD into best in class DeFi platforms. With a market cap that's reached a high of US$4 billion, FDUSD has become the third largest fully backed stablecoin in less than a year.

Our achievements are thanks to the hard work and dedication of our fantastic team, the unwavering support of our partners, and the trust of our customers. A huge thank you to everyone who has been part of this journey.

I've had the honor of introducing FDUSD at major events like Binance Blockchain Week and SUI Basecamp, showcasing our commitment to driving innovation and expanding the digital currency landscape.

Looking ahead, our vision extends beyond financial milestones. We are committed to pushing the boundaries of innovation, expanding the use cases of digital currency, and bridging traditional finance with Web3. The future holds exciting opportunities for FDUSD, including launching on more L2 blockchains, securing regionalised exchange listings for well defined use cases, expanding its utility in payments, settlements, and remittances.

Join us in celebrating this milestone and look forward to a future filled with more innovations and success. Together, we're shaping the future of digital finance.

As the fastest growing fiat-referenced#stablecoin, the resilience of FDUSD showcases the market's trust in our stablecoin and is a testament to our unwavering commitment to stability and transparency in the digital asset space.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation Founder and CEO at First Digital | FDUSD ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions.
profile_bio:
First Digital is your trusted guardian delivering next-generation financial services for global businesses and individuals to thrive in the digital asset economy. 

First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions to businesses, financial institutions and family offices navigating the next frontier in finance.

MULTI-ASSET CUSTODY & SAFEKEEPING
Fortify your treasury operations with First Digital's multi-asset custody solutions—streamlined for global reach, rapid settlement, and a host of value-added services.

STRUCTURED TRUST & ADVISORY 
Unlock a wealth of financial engineering and strategic regulatory expertise with tailored structuring and consulting services.

STABLECOIN SOLUTIONS 
Optimize your financial operations by harnessing the power of our deeply liquid and zero-fee stablecoin portfolio. First Digital is the home of FDUSD, a fully backed stablecoin issued out of Asia. 

PAYMENTS AND SETTLEMENTS
Streamline everyday expenses, cross-border payments and global payroll and enhance your financial fluidity.

WHO WE SERVE
Headquartered in Hong Kong and with a presence in the UK, Middle East, Singapore and Malaysia, First Digital’s clients comprise regulated financial institutions and fintech innovators including blockchain start-ups, money service businesses, token issuers, market makers, digital asset exchanges and family offices. 
 
OUR COMMITMENT TO REGULATORY COMPLIANCE
Fully aligned with Hong Kong’s Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorist Financing Ordinance, First Digital is licensed under the Trust Ordinance Section 8 of Hong Kong, is SOC1 Type 2 and SOC2 Type 2, ISO 27001 Certified as well as FATCA and AEoI Compliant.  

Get in touch for your multi-asset servicing needs: 
https://1stdigital.com/contact-us/

Celebrating a Year of Stability and Growth: First Digital Labs Marks the First Anniversary of its FDUSD Stablecoin

This week we're proud to celebrate the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing fiat-referenced stablecoin which has achieved a remarkable milestone, reaching a market cap high of over $4B USD in less than a year.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has demonstrated robust architecture and has seen growing adoption across the cryptocurrency ecosystem, establishing itself as a liquid, safe and trustworthy stablecoin option within investor's portfolios.

From strategic exchange listings, enhanced utility and expansion into DeFi - it has been an eventful first year of FDUSD.

A Word from our FounderVincent Chok, Founder and CEO of First Digital, stated: "This past year has been phenomenal. We set out to create a trusted stablecoin that bridges traditional finance with Web3 and plays a pivotal role in DeFi. From expansive listings and partnerships, FDUSD's journey reflects our commitment to providing a stable and reliable digital currency. Our vision extends beyond achieving financial milestones. We are committed to spearheading the evolution of digital currency applications. We look forward to the new stablecoin regulatory framework next year, which we believe will foster greater choice, innovation, and use cases in the market."

Looking to the Future
The road ahead for FDUSD is paved with ambitious plans. The team is set on enabling FDUSD on new blockchains, securing additional centralised exchange listings, and expanding use cases in payments, settlements, and remittances. Collaborations with strategic partners will continue to be a priority to enhance the broader distribution and usage of FDUSD.

We extend our heartfelt thanks to our customers, partners, and employees for their support. Founder and CEO at First Digital | FDUSD A Multi Billion-Dollar Journey That Started With Trust.

I am incredibly proud to mark the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing stablecoin, unlocking USD access to millions around the globe. This past year has been an amazing journey of innovation, growth, and success.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has set a new benchmark for stablecoin adoption in Asia Pacific, hitting remarkable milestones like listing on Binance, Bitget and other centralised exchanges, and onto new chains like Sui that help deployment of FDUSD into best in class DeFi platforms. With a market cap that's reached a high of US$4 billion, FDUSD has become the third largest fully backed stablecoin in less than a year.

Our achievements are thanks to the hard work and dedication of our fantastic team, the unwavering support of our partners, and the trust of our customers. A huge thank you to everyone who has been part of this journey.

I've had the honor of introducing FDUSD at major events like Binance Blockchain Week and SUI Basecamp, showcasing our commitment to driving innovation and expanding the digital currency landscape.

Looking ahead, our vision extends beyond financial milestones. We are committed to pushing the boundaries of innovation, expanding the use cases of digital currency, and bridging traditional finance with Web3. The future holds exciting opportunities for FDUSD, including launching on more L2 blockchains, securing regionalised exchange listings for well defined use cases, expanding its utility in payments, settlements, and remittances.

Join us in celebrating this milestone and look forward to a future filled with more innovations and success. Together, we're shaping the future of digital finance.

As the fastest growing fiat-referenced#stablecoin, the resilience of FDUSD showcases the market's trust in our stablecoin and is a testament to our unwavering commitment to stability and transparency in the digital asset space.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation Founder and CEO at First Digital | FDUSD ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions.
profile_bio:
First Digital is your trusted guardian delivering next-generation financial services for global businesses and individuals to thrive in the digital asset economy. 

First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions to businesses, financial institutions and family offices navigating the next frontier in finance.

MULTI-ASSET CUSTODY & SAFEKEEPING
Fortify your treasury operations with First Digital's multi-asset custody solutions—streamlined for global reach, rapid settlement, and a host of value-added services.

STRUCTURED TRUST & ADVISORY 
Unlock a wealth of financial engineering and strategic regulatory expertise with tailored structuring and consulting services.

STABLECOIN SOLUTIONS 
Optimize your financial operations by harnessing the power of our deeply liquid and zero-fee stablecoin portfolio. First Digital is the home of FDUSD, a fully backed stablecoin issued out of Asia. 

PAYMENTS AND SETTLEMENTS
Streamline everyday expenses, cross-border payments and global payroll and enhance your financial fluidity.

WHO WE SERVE
Headquartered in Hong Kong and with a presence in the UK, Middle East, Singapore and Malaysia, First Digital’s clients comprise regulated financial institutions and fintech innovators including blockchain start-ups, money service businesses, token issuers, market makers, digital asset exchanges and family offices. 
 
OUR COMMITMENT TO REGULATORY COMPLIANCE
Fully aligned with Hong Kong’s Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorist Financing Ordinance, First Digital is licensed under the Trust Ordinance Section 8 of Hong Kong, is SOC1 Type 2 and SOC2 Type 2, ISO 27001 Certified as well as FATCA and AEoI Compliant.  

Get in touch for your multi-asset servicing needs: 
https://1stdigital.com/contact-us/

Celebrating a Year of Stability and Growth: First Digital Labs Marks the First Anniversary of its FDUSD Stablecoin

This week we're proud to celebrate the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing fiat-referenced stablecoin which has achieved a remarkable milestone, reaching a market cap high of over $4B USD in less than a year.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has demonstrated robust architecture and has seen growing adoption across the cryptocurrency ecosystem, establishing itself as a liquid, safe and trustworthy stablecoin option within investor's portfolios.

From strategic exchange listings, enhanced utility and expansion into DeFi - it has been an eventful first year of FDUSD.

A Word from our FounderVincent Chok, Founder and CEO of First Digital, stated: "This past year has been phenomenal. We set out to create a trusted stablecoin that bridges traditional finance with Web3 and plays a pivotal role in DeFi. From expansive listings and partnerships, FDUSD's journey reflects our commitment to providing a stable and reliable digital currency. Our vision extends beyond achieving financial milestones. We are committed to spearheading the evolution of digital currency applications. We look forward to the new stablecoin regulatory framework next year, which we believe will foster greater choice, innovation, and use cases in the market."

Looking to the Future
The road ahead for FDUSD is paved with ambitious plans. The team is set on enabling FDUSD on new blockchains, securing additional centralised exchange listings, and expanding use cases in payments, settlements, and remittances. Collaborations with strategic partners will continue to be a priority to enhance the broader distribution and usage of FDUSD.

We extend our heartfelt thanks to our customers, partners, and employees for their support. Founder and CEO at First Digital | FDUSD A Multi Billion-Dollar Journey That Started With Trust.

I am incredibly proud to mark the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing stablecoin, unlocking USD access to millions around the globe. This past year has been an amazing journey of innovation, growth, and success.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has set a new benchmark for stablecoin adoption in Asia Pacific, hitting remarkable milestones like listing on Binance, Bitget and other centralised exchanges, and onto new chains like Sui that help deployment of FDUSD into best in class DeFi platforms. With a market cap that's reached a high of US$4 billion, FDUSD has become the third largest fully backed stablecoin in less than a year.

Our achievements are thanks to the hard work and dedication of our fantastic team, the unwavering support of our partners, and the trust of our customers. A huge thank you to everyone who has been part of this journey.

I've had the honor of introducing FDUSD at major events like Binance Blockchain Week and SUI Basecamp, showcasing our commitment to driving innovation and expanding the digital currency landscape.

Looking ahead, our vision extends beyond financial milestones. We are committed to pushing the boundaries of innovation, expanding the use cases of digital currency, and bridging traditional finance with Web3. The future holds exciting opportunities for FDUSD, including launching on more L2 blockchains, securing regionalised exchange listings for well defined use cases, expanding its utility in payments, settlements, and remittances.

Join us in celebrating this milestone and look forward to a future filled with more innovations and success. Together, we're shaping the future of digital finance.

As the fastest growing fiat-referenced#stablecoin, the resilience of FDUSD showcases the market's trust in our stablecoin and is a testament to our unwavering commitment to stability and transparency in the digital asset space.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

In a riveting fireside chat with Raj Nandwani, Head of Global Business Development atBinance, we delved into the topic "Traditional Finance and the Intersection of the New Digital Assets Frontier."

What a successful first day of riveting discussions lead by our very own Vincent Chok on a topic that is not going away anytime soon,#stablecoins.

It was great to see Vincent take the stage at such a prestigious conference and with high calibre industry insiders such as Lucy and Sinan, who both shared a lot of interesting insights around stable digital currencies 👏 Founder and CEO at First Digital | FDUSD Engaging Week atBinanceBlockchain Week in Istanbul!

Day 1 set a high bar with a panel discussion on "Unlocking Value and Stablecoin Adoption in Asia," where I had the honor of sharing the stage with thought leaders in the industry. Moderated byBinance's Global Head of Sanctions, we engaged in deep discussions alongsideLucy Gazmararian, Founder & Managing Partner ofToken Bay Capital, andSinan Kocç, CEO ofBiLira.

Together, we discussed how#stablecoinscan co-exist with central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) to power the financial infrastructure of Web 2.5 through to 3.0. The dialogue opened up perspectives on the power of consumer choice in the future of currency. 

The spotlight on stablecoins is brighter than ever, especially considering their expanding use cases, from streamlining payroll, payments, to banking the unbanked. It is also clear that the conversation around regulatory frameworks for stablecoins is just as crucial as their development and the need for a balanced approach that foster#innovationwhile ensuring security and#trustin the system.#FDUSD#BinanceBlockchainWeek#CBDC#FinancialInclusion#Regulation#Asia

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation Founder and CEO at First Digital | FDUSD ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions.
profile_bio:
First Digital is your trusted guardian delivering next-generation financial services for global businesses and individuals to thrive in the digital asset economy. 

First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions to businesses, financial institutions and family offices navigating the next frontier in finance.

MULTI-ASSET CUSTODY & SAFEKEEPING
Fortify your treasury operations with First Digital's multi-asset custody solutions—streamlined for global reach, rapid settlement, and a host of value-added services.

STRUCTURED TRUST & ADVISORY 
Unlock a wealth of financial engineering and strategic regulatory expertise with tailored structuring and consulting services.

STABLECOIN SOLUTIONS 
Optimize your financial operations by harnessing the power of our deeply liquid and zero-fee stablecoin portfolio. First Digital is the home of FDUSD, a fully backed stablecoin issued out of Asia. 

PAYMENTS AND SETTLEMENTS
Streamline everyday expenses, cross-border payments and global payroll and enhance your financial fluidity.

WHO WE SERVE
Headquartered in Hong Kong and with a presence in the UK, Middle East, Singapore and Malaysia, First Digital’s clients comprise regulated financial institutions and fintech innovators including blockchain start-ups, money service businesses, token issuers, market makers, digital asset exchanges and family offices. 
 
OUR COMMITMENT TO REGULATORY COMPLIANCE
Fully aligned with Hong Kong’s Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorist Financing Ordinance, First Digital is licensed under the Trust Ordinance Section 8 of Hong Kong, is SOC1 Type 2 and SOC2 Type 2, ISO 27001 Certified as well as FATCA and AEoI Compliant.  

Get in touch for your multi-asset servicing needs: 
https://1stdigital.com/contact-us/

Celebrating a Year of Stability and Growth: First Digital Labs Marks the First Anniversary of its FDUSD Stablecoin

This week we're proud to celebrate the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing fiat-referenced stablecoin which has achieved a remarkable milestone, reaching a market cap high of over $4B USD in less than a year.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has demonstrated robust architecture and has seen growing adoption across the cryptocurrency ecosystem, establishing itself as a liquid, safe and trustworthy stablecoin option within investor's portfolios.

From strategic exchange listings, enhanced utility and expansion into DeFi - it has been an eventful first year of FDUSD.

A Word from our FounderVincent Chok, Founder and CEO of First Digital, stated: "This past year has been phenomenal. We set out to create a trusted stablecoin that bridges traditional finance with Web3 and plays a pivotal role in DeFi. From expansive listings and partnerships, FDUSD's journey reflects our commitment to providing a stable and reliable digital currency. Our vision extends beyond achieving financial milestones. We are committed to spearheading the evolution of digital currency applications. We look forward to the new stablecoin regulatory framework next year, which we believe will foster greater choice, innovation, and use cases in the market."

Looking to the Future
The road ahead for FDUSD is paved with ambitious plans. The team is set on enabling FDUSD on new blockchains, securing additional centralised exchange listings, and expanding use cases in payments, settlements, and remittances. Collaborations with strategic partners will continue to be a priority to enhance the broader distribution and usage of FDUSD.

We extend our heartfelt thanks to our customers, partners, and employees for their support. Founder and CEO at First Digital | FDUSD A Multi Billion-Dollar Journey That Started With Trust.

I am incredibly proud to mark the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing stablecoin, unlocking USD access to millions around the globe. This past year has been an amazing journey of innovation, growth, and success.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has set a new benchmark for stablecoin adoption in Asia Pacific, hitting remarkable milestones like listing on Binance, Bitget and other centralised exchanges, and onto new chains like Sui that help deployment of FDUSD into best in class DeFi platforms. With a market cap that's reached a high of US$4 billion, FDUSD has become the third largest fully backed stablecoin in less than a year.

Our achievements are thanks to the hard work and dedication of our fantastic team, the unwavering support of our partners, and the trust of our customers. A huge thank you to everyone who has been part of this journey.

I've had the honor of introducing FDUSD at major events like Binance Blockchain Week and SUI Basecamp, showcasing our commitment to driving innovation and expanding the digital currency landscape.

Looking ahead, our vision extends beyond financial milestones. We are committed to pushing the boundaries of innovation, expanding the use cases of digital currency, and bridging traditional finance with Web3. The future holds exciting opportunities for FDUSD, including launching on more L2 blockchains, securing regionalised exchange listings for well defined use cases, expanding its utility in payments, settlements, and remittances.

Join us in celebrating this milestone and look forward to a future filled with more innovations and success. Together, we're shaping the future of digital finance.

As the fastest growing fiat-referenced#stablecoin, the resilience of FDUSD showcases the market's trust in our stablecoin and is a testament to our unwavering commitment to stability and transparency in the digital asset space.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation Founder and CEO at First Digital | FDUSD ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions.
profile_bio:
First Digital is your trusted guardian delivering next-generation financial services for global businesses and individuals to thrive in the digital asset economy. 

First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions to businesses, financial institutions and family offices navigating the next frontier in finance.

MULTI-ASSET CUSTODY & SAFEKEEPING
Fortify your treasury operations with First Digital's multi-asset custody solutions—streamlined for global reach, rapid settlement, and a host of value-added services.

STRUCTURED TRUST & ADVISORY 
Unlock a wealth of financial engineering and strategic regulatory expertise with tailored structuring and consulting services.

STABLECOIN SOLUTIONS 
Optimize your financial operations by harnessing the power of our deeply liquid and zero-fee stablecoin portfolio. First Digital is the home of FDUSD, a fully backed stablecoin issued out of Asia. 

PAYMENTS AND SETTLEMENTS
Streamline everyday expenses, cross-border payments and global payroll and enhance your financial fluidity.

WHO WE SERVE
Headquartered in Hong Kong and with a presence in the UK, Middle East, Singapore and Malaysia, First Digital’s clients comprise regulated financial institutions and fintech innovators including blockchain start-ups, money service businesses, token issuers, market makers, digital asset exchanges and family offices. 
 
OUR COMMITMENT TO REGULATORY COMPLIANCE
Fully aligned with Hong Kong’s Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorist Financing Ordinance, First Digital is licensed under the Trust Ordinance Section 8 of Hong Kong, is SOC1 Type 2 and SOC2 Type 2, ISO 27001 Certified as well as FATCA and AEoI Compliant.  

Get in touch for your multi-asset servicing needs: 
https://1stdigital.com/contact-us/

Celebrating a Year of Stability and Growth: First Digital Labs Marks the First Anniversary of its FDUSD Stablecoin

This week we're proud to celebrate the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing fiat-referenced stablecoin which has achieved a remarkable milestone, reaching a market cap high of over $4B USD in less than a year.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has demonstrated robust architecture and has seen growing adoption across the cryptocurrency ecosystem, establishing itself as a liquid, safe and trustworthy stablecoin option within investor's portfolios.

From strategic exchange listings, enhanced utility and expansion into DeFi - it has been an eventful first year of FDUSD.

A Word from our FounderVincent Chok, Founder and CEO of First Digital, stated: "This past year has been phenomenal. We set out to create a trusted stablecoin that bridges traditional finance with Web3 and plays a pivotal role in DeFi. From expansive listings and partnerships, FDUSD's journey reflects our commitment to providing a stable and reliable digital currency. Our vision extends beyond achieving financial milestones. We are committed to spearheading the evolution of digital currency applications. We look forward to the new stablecoin regulatory framework next year, which we believe will foster greater choice, innovation, and use cases in the market."

Looking to the Future
The road ahead for FDUSD is paved with ambitious plans. The team is set on enabling FDUSD on new blockchains, securing additional centralised exchange listings, and expanding use cases in payments, settlements, and remittances. Collaborations with strategic partners will continue to be a priority to enhance the broader distribution and usage of FDUSD.

We extend our heartfelt thanks to our customers, partners, and employees for their support. Founder and CEO at First Digital | FDUSD A Multi Billion-Dollar Journey That Started With Trust.

I am incredibly proud to mark the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing stablecoin, unlocking USD access to millions around the globe. This past year has been an amazing journey of innovation, growth, and success.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has set a new benchmark for stablecoin adoption in Asia Pacific, hitting remarkable milestones like listing on Binance, Bitget and other centralised exchanges, and onto new chains like Sui that help deployment of FDUSD into best in class DeFi platforms. With a market cap that's reached a high of US$4 billion, FDUSD has become the third largest fully backed stablecoin in less than a year.

Our achievements are thanks to the hard work and dedication of our fantastic team, the unwavering support of our partners, and the trust of our customers. A huge thank you to everyone who has been part of this journey.

I've had the honor of introducing FDUSD at major events like Binance Blockchain Week and SUI Basecamp, showcasing our commitment to driving innovation and expanding the digital currency landscape.

Looking ahead, our vision extends beyond financial milestones. We are committed to pushing the boundaries of innovation, expanding the use cases of digital currency, and bridging traditional finance with Web3. The future holds exciting opportunities for FDUSD, including launching on more L2 blockchains, securing regionalised exchange listings for well defined use cases, expanding its utility in payments, settlements, and remittances.

Join us in celebrating this milestone and look forward to a future filled with more innovations and success. Together, we're shaping the future of digital finance.

As the fastest growing fiat-referenced#stablecoin, the resilience of FDUSD showcases the market's trust in our stablecoin and is a testament to our unwavering commitment to stability and transparency in the digital asset space.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. 3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

Great to see our CEOVincent Chokthoughts and insights published in an Op Ed withForkast.Newson why Hong Kong is becoming the defacto#cryptohub globally 🌏 

It's an intresting must read!https://lnkd.in/gPeTqXwH#digitalassets#crypto#blockchaindevelopment#innovation Founder and CEO at First Digital | FDUSD ThanksForkast.Newsfor featuring my thoughts on how#HongKongDollar notes offer a clue for the future of#digitalassets.  
 
Hong Kong is one of the few economies to have more than one private bank issue official banknotes, a testament to how the public-private partnership model can yield greater system credibility and penetration. Public-private partnerships is a familiar concept in Hong Kong in the delivery of public services and history has shown this model can also successfully in support the city’s world-class financial system. 
 
This is where we see clues as to how digital assets might be integrated into the city’s financial system in the near future – regulator HKMA has been urging banks to adopt a forward-looking approach and open bank accounts for licensed#VASPssince 1 June. 
 
Asia has taken a progressive stance toward digital assets and has recently doubled down on this. Today,#Singaporehas put clarity on#stablecoins, putting it amongst the first jurisdictions globally to agree to stablecoin#cryptoregulation. Whilst Hong Kong is also committed to introducing#regulationsfor stablecoin by 2024. 
 
I've said this in the past and I’ll reinforce the fact that I’m#bullishon Asia and strongly believe that we have the technological innovation and right mechanisms in place, it’s just a matter of time for the industry to flourish.
 
Read the article here:https://bit.ly/3DVHuSX

profile_overview: First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions.
profile_bio:
First Digital is your trusted guardian delivering next-generation financial services for global businesses and individuals to thrive in the digital asset economy. 

First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions to businesses, financial institutions and family offices navigating the next frontier in finance.

MULTI-ASSET CUSTODY & SAFEKEEPING
Fortify your treasury operations with First Digital's multi-asset custody solutions—streamlined for global reach, rapid settlement, and a host of value-added services.

STRUCTURED TRUST & ADVISORY 
Unlock a wealth of financial engineering and strategic regulatory expertise with tailored structuring and consulting services.

STABLECOIN SOLUTIONS 
Optimize your financial operations by harnessing the power of our deeply liquid and zero-fee stablecoin portfolio. First Digital is the home of FDUSD, a fully backed stablecoin issued out of Asia. 

PAYMENTS AND SETTLEMENTS
Streamline everyday expenses, cross-border payments and global payroll and enhance your financial fluidity.

WHO WE SERVE
Headquartered in Hong Kong and with a presence in the UK, Middle East, Singapore and Malaysia, First Digital’s clients comprise regulated financial institutions and fintech innovators including blockchain start-ups, money service businesses, token issuers, market makers, digital asset exchanges and family offices. 
 
OUR COMMITMENT TO REGULATORY COMPLIANCE
Fully aligned with Hong Kong’s Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorist Financing Ordinance, First Digital is licensed under the Trust Ordinance Section 8 of Hong Kong, is SOC1 Type 2 and SOC2 Type 2, ISO 27001 Certified as well as FATCA and AEoI Compliant.  

Get in touch for your multi-asset servicing needs: 
https://1stdigital.com/contact-us/

extracted_posts.post_content:
First Digital Labs' Commitment to Transparency and Security

A cornerstone of FDUSD's success has been our unwavering commitment to transparency. FDUSD's reserves undergo regular attestations by a reputable third-party auditor, ensuring that every token is fully backed by appropriate reserves. 

Our reserves are held in a diversified portfolio that includes US Treasury Bills (T-Bills), overnight reverse repurchase agreements (repos), and cash. This prudent allocation strategy ensures that FDUSD remains fully collateralised, minimising counterparty risk and maintaining the stability of its value.

Celebrating a Year of Stability and Growth: First Digital Labs Marks the First Anniversary of its FDUSD Stablecoin

This week we're proud to celebrate the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing fiat-referenced stablecoin which has achieved a remarkable milestone, reaching a market cap high of over $4B USD in less than a year.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has demonstrated robust architecture and has seen growing adoption across the cryptocurrency ecosystem, establishing itself as a liquid, safe and trustworthy stablecoin option within investor's portfolios.

From strategic exchange listings, enhanced utility and expansion into DeFi - it has been an eventful first year of FDUSD.

A Word from our FounderVincent Chok, Founder and CEO of First Digital, stated: "This past year has been phenomenal. We set out to create a trusted stablecoin that bridges traditional finance with Web3 and plays a pivotal role in DeFi. From expansive listings and partnerships, FDUSD's journey reflects our commitment to providing a stable and reliable digital currency. Our vision extends beyond achieving financial milestones. We are committed to spearheading the evolution of digital currency applications. We look forward to the new stablecoin regulatory framework next year, which we believe will foster greater choice, innovation, and use cases in the market."

Looking to the Future
The road ahead for FDUSD is paved with ambitious plans. The team is set on enabling FDUSD on new blockchains, securing additional centralised exchange listings, and expanding use cases in payments, settlements, and remittances. Collaborations with strategic partners will continue to be a priority to enhance the broader distribution and usage of FDUSD.

We extend our heartfelt thanks to our customers, partners, and employees for their support. Founder and CEO at First Digital | FDUSD A Multi Billion-Dollar Journey That Started With Trust.

I am incredibly proud to mark the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing stablecoin, unlocking USD access to millions around the globe. This past year has been an amazing journey of innovation, growth, and success.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has set a new benchmark for stablecoin adoption in Asia Pacific, hitting remarkable milestones like listing on Binance, Bitget and other centralised exchanges, and onto new chains like Sui that help deployment of FDUSD into best in class DeFi platforms. With a market cap that's reached a high of US$4 billion, FDUSD has become the third largest fully backed stablecoin in less than a year.

Our achievements are thanks to the hard work and dedication of our fantastic team, the unwavering support of our partners, and the trust of our customers. A huge thank you to everyone who has been part of this journey.

I've had the honor of introducing FDUSD at major events like Binance Blockchain Week and SUI Basecamp, showcasing our commitment to driving innovation and expanding the digital currency landscape.

Join us in celebrating this milestone and look forward to a future filled with more innovations and success. Together, we're shaping the future of digital finance.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

profile_overview: First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions.
profile_bio:
First Digital is your trusted guardian delivering next-generation financial services for global businesses and individuals to thrive in the digital asset economy. 

First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions to businesses, financial institutions and family offices navigating the next frontier in finance.

MULTI-ASSET CUSTODY & SAFEKEEPING
Fortify your treasury operations with First Digital's multi-asset custody solutions—streamlined for global reach, rapid settlement, and a host of value-added services.

STRUCTURED TRUST & ADVISORY 
Unlock a wealth of financial engineering and strategic regulatory expertise with tailored structuring and consulting services.

STABLECOIN SOLUTIONS 
Optimize your financial operations by harnessing the power of our deeply liquid and zero-fee stablecoin portfolio. First Digital is the home of FDUSD, a fully backed stablecoin issued out of Asia. 

PAYMENTS AND SETTLEMENTS
Streamline everyday expenses, cross-border payments and global payroll and enhance your financial fluidity.

WHO WE SERVE
Headquartered in Hong Kong and with a presence in the UK, Middle East, Singapore and Malaysia, First Digital’s clients comprise regulated financial institutions and fintech innovators including blockchain start-ups, money service businesses, token issuers, market makers, digital asset exchanges and family offices. 
 
OUR COMMITMENT TO REGULATORY COMPLIANCE
Fully aligned with Hong Kong’s Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorist Financing Ordinance, First Digital is licensed under the Trust Ordinance Section 8 of Hong Kong, is SOC1 Type 2 and SOC2 Type 2, ISO 27001 Certified as well as FATCA and AEoI Compliant.  

Get in touch for your multi-asset servicing needs: 
https://1stdigital.com/contact-us/

First Digital Labs' Commitment to Transparency and Security

A cornerstone of FDUSD's success has been our unwavering commitment to transparency. FDUSD's reserves undergo regular attestations by a reputable third-party auditor, ensuring that every token is fully backed by appropriate reserves. 

Our reserves are held in a diversified portfolio that includes US Treasury Bills (T-Bills), overnight reverse repurchase agreements (repos), and cash. This prudent allocation strategy ensures that FDUSD remains fully collateralised, minimising counterparty risk and maintaining the stability of its value.

This rigorous attestation process fosters confidence among users, underscoring the integrity and reliability of FDUSD. 

View all the attestation reports at our website:firstdigitallabs.com

Celebrating a Year of Stability and Growth: First Digital Labs Marks the First Anniversary of its FDUSD Stablecoin

This week we're proud to celebrate the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing fiat-referenced stablecoin which has achieved a remarkable milestone, reaching a market cap high of over $4B USD in less than a year.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has demonstrated robust architecture and has seen growing adoption across the cryptocurrency ecosystem, establishing itself as a liquid, safe and trustworthy stablecoin option within investor's portfolios.

From strategic exchange listings, enhanced utility and expansion into DeFi - it has been an eventful first year of FDUSD.

A Word from our FounderVincent Chok, Founder and CEO of First Digital, stated: "This past year has been phenomenal. We set out to create a trusted stablecoin that bridges traditional finance with Web3 and plays a pivotal role in DeFi. From expansive listings and partnerships, FDUSD's journey reflects our commitment to providing a stable and reliable digital currency. Our vision extends beyond achieving financial milestones. We are committed to spearheading the evolution of digital currency applications. We look forward to the new stablecoin regulatory framework next year, which we believe will foster greater choice, innovation, and use cases in the market."

Looking to the Future
The road ahead for FDUSD is paved with ambitious plans. The team is set on enabling FDUSD on new blockchains, securing additional centralised exchange listings, and expanding use cases in payments, settlements, and remittances. Collaborations with strategic partners will continue to be a priority to enhance the broader distribution and usage of FDUSD.

We extend our heartfelt thanks to our customers, partners, and employees for their support. Founder and CEO at First Digital | FDUSD A Multi Billion-Dollar Journey That Started With Trust.

I am incredibly proud to mark the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing stablecoin, unlocking USD access to millions around the globe. This past year has been an amazing journey of innovation, growth, and success.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has set a new benchmark for stablecoin adoption in Asia Pacific, hitting remarkable milestones like listing on Binance, Bitget and other centralised exchanges, and onto new chains like Sui that help deployment of FDUSD into best in class DeFi platforms. With a market cap that's reached a high of US$4 billion, FDUSD has become the third largest fully backed stablecoin in less than a year.

Our achievements are thanks to the hard work and dedication of our fantastic team, the unwavering support of our partners, and the trust of our customers. A huge thank you to everyone who has been part of this journey.

I've had the honor of introducing FDUSD at major events like Binance Blockchain Week and SUI Basecamp, showcasing our commitment to driving innovation and expanding the digital currency landscape.

Looking ahead, our vision extends beyond financial milestones. We are committed to pushing the boundaries of innovation, expanding the use cases of digital currency, and bridging traditional finance with Web3. The future holds exciting opportunities for FDUSD, including launching on more L2 blockchains, securing regionalised exchange listings for well defined use cases, expanding its utility in payments, settlements, and remittances.

Join us in celebrating this milestone and look forward to a future filled with more innovations and success. Together, we're shaping the future of digital finance.

As the fastest growing fiat-referenced#stablecoin, the resilience of FDUSD showcases the market's trust in our stablecoin and is a testament to our unwavering commitment to stability and transparency in the digital asset space.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

profile_overview: First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions.
profile_bio:
First Digital is your trusted guardian delivering next-generation financial services for global businesses and individuals to thrive in the digital asset economy. 

First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions to businesses, financial institutions and family offices navigating the next frontier in finance.

MULTI-ASSET CUSTODY & SAFEKEEPING
Fortify your treasury operations with First Digital's multi-asset custody solutions—streamlined for global reach, rapid settlement, and a host of value-added services.

STRUCTURED TRUST & ADVISORY 
Unlock a wealth of financial engineering and strategic regulatory expertise with tailored structuring and consulting services.

STABLECOIN SOLUTIONS 
Optimize your financial operations by harnessing the power of our deeply liquid and zero-fee stablecoin portfolio. First Digital is the home of FDUSD, a fully backed stablecoin issued out of Asia. 

PAYMENTS AND SETTLEMENTS
Streamline everyday expenses, cross-border payments and global payroll and enhance your financial fluidity.

WHO WE SERVE
Headquartered in Hong Kong and with a presence in the UK, Middle East, Singapore and Malaysia, First Digital’s clients comprise regulated financial institutions and fintech innovators including blockchain start-ups, money service businesses, token issuers, market makers, digital asset exchanges and family offices. 
 
OUR COMMITMENT TO REGULATORY COMPLIANCE
Fully aligned with Hong Kong’s Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorist Financing Ordinance, First Digital is licensed under the Trust Ordinance Section 8 of Hong Kong, is SOC1 Type 2 and SOC2 Type 2, ISO 27001 Certified as well as FATCA and AEoI Compliant.  

Get in touch for your multi-asset servicing needs: 
https://1stdigital.com/contact-us/

First Digital Labs' Commitment to Transparency and Security

A cornerstone of FDUSD's success has been our unwavering commitment to transparency. FDUSD's reserves undergo regular attestations by a reputable third-party auditor, ensuring that every token is fully backed by appropriate reserves. 

Our reserves are held in a diversified portfolio that includes US Treasury Bills (T-Bills), overnight reverse repurchase agreements (repos), and cash. This prudent allocation strategy ensures that FDUSD remains fully collateralised, minimising counterparty risk and maintaining the stability of its value.

This rigorous attestation process fosters confidence among users, underscoring the integrity and reliability of FDUSD. 

View all the attestation reports at our website:firstdigitallabs.com

Celebrating a Year of Stability and Growth: First Digital Labs Marks the First Anniversary of its FDUSD Stablecoin

This week we're proud to celebrate the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing fiat-referenced stablecoin which has achieved a remarkable milestone, reaching a market cap high of over $4B USD in less than a year.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has demonstrated robust architecture and has seen growing adoption across the cryptocurrency ecosystem, establishing itself as a liquid, safe and trustworthy stablecoin option within investor's portfolios.

From strategic exchange listings, enhanced utility and expansion into DeFi - it has been an eventful first year of FDUSD.

A Word from our FounderVincent Chok, Founder and CEO of First Digital, stated: "This past year has been phenomenal. We set out to create a trusted stablecoin that bridges traditional finance with Web3 and plays a pivotal role in DeFi. From expansive listings and partnerships, FDUSD's journey reflects our commitment to providing a stable and reliable digital currency. Our vision extends beyond achieving financial milestones. We are committed to spearheading the evolution of digital currency applications. We look forward to the new stablecoin regulatory framework next year, which we believe will foster greater choice, innovation, and use cases in the market."

Looking to the Future
The road ahead for FDUSD is paved with ambitious plans. The team is set on enabling FDUSD on new blockchains, securing additional centralised exchange listings, and expanding use cases in payments, settlements, and remittances. Collaborations with strategic partners will continue to be a priority to enhance the broader distribution and usage of FDUSD.

We extend our heartfelt thanks to our customers, partners, and employees for their support. Founder and CEO at First Digital | FDUSD A Multi Billion-Dollar Journey That Started With Trust.

I am incredibly proud to mark the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing stablecoin, unlocking USD access to millions around the globe. This past year has been an amazing journey of innovation, growth, and success.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has set a new benchmark for stablecoin adoption in Asia Pacific, hitting remarkable milestones like listing on Binance, Bitget and other centralised exchanges, and onto new chains like Sui that help deployment of FDUSD into best in class DeFi platforms. With a market cap that's reached a high of US$4 billion, FDUSD has become the third largest fully backed stablecoin in less than a year.

Our achievements are thanks to the hard work and dedication of our fantastic team, the unwavering support of our partners, and the trust of our customers. A huge thank you to everyone who has been part of this journey.

I've had the honor of introducing FDUSD at major events like Binance Blockchain Week and SUI Basecamp, showcasing our commitment to driving innovation and expanding the digital currency landscape.

Looking ahead, our vision extends beyond financial milestones. We are committed to pushing the boundaries of innovation, expanding the use cases of digital currency, and bridging traditional finance with Web3. The future holds exciting opportunities for FDUSD, including launching on more L2 blockchains, securing regionalised exchange listings for well defined use cases, expanding its utility in payments, settlements, and remittances.

Join us in celebrating this milestone and look forward to a future filled with more innovations and success. Together, we're shaping the future of digital finance.

As the fastest growing fiat-referenced#stablecoin, the resilience of FDUSD showcases the market's trust in our stablecoin and is a testament to our unwavering commitment to stability and transparency in the digital asset space.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.

profile_overview: First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions.
profile_bio:
First Digital is your trusted guardian delivering next-generation financial services for global businesses and individuals to thrive in the digital asset economy. 

First Digital specialises in providing bespoke multi-asset Custodial, Trust, Payments and Stablecoin solutions to businesses, financial institutions and family offices navigating the next frontier in finance.

MULTI-ASSET CUSTODY & SAFEKEEPING
Fortify your treasury operations with First Digital's multi-asset custody solutions—streamlined for global reach, rapid settlement, and a host of value-added services.

STRUCTURED TRUST & ADVISORY 
Unlock a wealth of financial engineering and strategic regulatory expertise with tailored structuring and consulting services.

STABLECOIN SOLUTIONS 
Optimize your financial operations by harnessing the power of our deeply liquid and zero-fee stablecoin portfolio. First Digital is the home of FDUSD, a fully backed stablecoin issued out of Asia. 

PAYMENTS AND SETTLEMENTS
Streamline everyday expenses, cross-border payments and global payroll and enhance your financial fluidity.

WHO WE SERVE
Headquartered in Hong Kong and with a presence in the UK, Middle East, Singapore and Malaysia, First Digital’s clients comprise regulated financial institutions and fintech innovators including blockchain start-ups, money service businesses, token issuers, market makers, digital asset exchanges and family offices. 
 
OUR COMMITMENT TO REGULATORY COMPLIANCE
Fully aligned with Hong Kong’s Anti-Money Laundering and Counter-Terrorist Financing Ordinance, First Digital is licensed under the Trust Ordinance Section 8 of Hong Kong, is SOC1 Type 2 and SOC2 Type 2, ISO 27001 Certified as well as FATCA and AEoI Compliant.  

Get in touch for your multi-asset servicing needs: 
https://1stdigital.com/contact-us/

extracted_posts.post_content:
We're pleased to share that#FDUSDis now listed onCoins.ph- one of the Philippines’ leading licensed cryptocurrency exchanges with over 18 million registered users. 

The FDUSD/PHP pair aims to provide Filipinos with an easy and convenient on/off-ramp to convert their local currency into a stablecoin and take advantage of blockchain technology's speed and reliability. With lower transaction costs, as well as faster and more secure transactions, the FDUSD/PHP pair facilitates cross-border#paymentsand overseas#remittances, which continue to be an important component of the Filipino economy.

Through this partnership,First DigitalandCoins.phare committed to a comprehensive education initiative, covering how to send and receive FDUSD for payments and facilitate cross-border financial flows, empowering users with practical knowledge and skills.

First Digital Labs' Commitment to Transparency and Security

A cornerstone of FDUSD's success has been our unwavering commitment to transparency. FDUSD's reserves undergo regular attestations by a reputable third-party auditor, ensuring that every token is fully backed by appropriate reserves. 

Our reserves are held in a diversified portfolio that includes US Treasury Bills (T-Bills), overnight reverse repurchase agreements (repos), and cash. This prudent allocation strategy ensures that FDUSD remains fully collateralised, minimising counterparty risk and maintaining the stability of its value.

This rigorous attestation process fosters confidence among users, underscoring the integrity and reliability of FDUSD. 

View all the attestation reports at our website:firstdigitallabs.com

Celebrating a Year of Stability and Growth: First Digital Labs Marks the First Anniversary of its FDUSD Stablecoin

This week we're proud to celebrate the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing fiat-referenced stablecoin which has achieved a remarkable milestone, reaching a market cap high of over $4B USD in less than a year.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has demonstrated robust architecture and has seen growing adoption across the cryptocurrency ecosystem, establishing itself as a liquid, safe and trustworthy stablecoin option within investor's portfolios.

From strategic exchange listings, enhanced utility and expansion into DeFi - it has been an eventful first year of FDUSD.

A Word from our FounderVincent Chok, Founder and CEO of First Digital, stated: "This past year has been phenomenal. We set out to create a trusted stablecoin that bridges traditional finance with Web3 and plays a pivotal role in DeFi. From expansive listings and partnerships, FDUSD's journey reflects our commitment to providing a stable and reliable digital currency. Our vision extends beyond achieving financial milestones. We are committed to spearheading the evolution of digital currency applications. We look forward to the new stablecoin regulatory framework next year, which we believe will foster greater choice, innovation, and use cases in the market."

Looking to the Future
The road ahead for FDUSD is paved with ambitious plans. The team is set on enabling FDUSD on new blockchains, securing additional centralised exchange listings, and expanding use cases in payments, settlements, and remittances. Collaborations with strategic partners will continue to be a priority to enhance the broader distribution and usage of FDUSD.

We extend our heartfelt thanks to our customers, partners, and employees for their support. Founder and CEO at First Digital | FDUSD A Multi Billion-Dollar Journey That Started With Trust.

I am incredibly proud to mark the first anniversary of#FDUSD, the fastest growing stablecoin, unlocking USD access to millions around the globe. This past year has been an amazing journey of innovation, growth, and success.

Launched in June 2023, FDUSD has set a new benchmark for stablecoin adoption in Asia Pacific, hitting remarkable milestones like listing on Binance, Bitget and other centralised exchanges, and onto new chains like Sui that help deployment of FDUSD into best in class DeFi platforms. With a market cap that's reached a high of US$4 billion, FDUSD has become the third largest fully backed stablecoin in less than a year.

Our achievements are thanks to the hard work and dedication of our fantastic team, the unwavering support of our partners, and the trust of our customers. A huge thank you to everyone who has been part of this journey.

I've had the honor of introducing FDUSD at major events like Binance Blockchain Week and SUI Basecamp, showcasing our commitment to driving innovation and expanding the digital currency landscape.

Looking ahead, our vision extends beyond financial milestones. We are committed to pushing the boundaries of innovation, expanding the use cases of digital currency, and bridging traditional finance with Web3. The future holds exciting opportunities for FDUSD, including launching on more L2 blockchains, securing regionalised exchange listings for well defined use cases, expanding its utility in payments, settlements, and remittances.

Join us in celebrating this milestone and look forward to a future filled with more innovations and success. Together, we're shaping the future of digital finance.

As the fastest growing fiat-referenced#stablecoin, the resilience of FDUSD showcases the market's trust in our stablecoin and is a testament to our unwavering commitment to stability and transparency in the digital asset space.

Let’s learn more about $FDUSD.

1. Redeemable: Holders have the ability to redeem their#FDUSDtokens at a similar value for U.S. dollars, as FDUSD is backed by high-quality cash reserves and cash equivalents. This offers users peace of mind knowing their digital currency holds real and retrievable value.

2. Backed by quality assets: FDUSD is designed to maintain a stable price, which can appeal to those looking to deal with the volatility of the cryptocurrency market. FDUSD reserves are segregated from the custodian’s own funds, separating users' assets from any financial troubles of the custodian. Under the stewardship of First Digital Trust Limited, FDUSD reserves are more secure and protected, which contributes towards FDUSD’s stability.

3. Programmable: FDUSD’s programmability enables the execution of smart contracts, escrow services, and insurance arrangements without the need for intermediaries. This paves the way for users to have more control over their financial transactions, enhancing transactional efficiency and minimizing costs.

4. Low fees: The cost-efficiency of blockchain-based transactions reduces associated fees, a stark contrast to traditional financial systems. The lower cost of FDUSD transactions presents an alternative for users, enabling broader accessibility and financial inclusion. 

5. Operates on decentralized networks: FDUSD works on decentralized networks distributed across multiple nodes. This means no single point of failure can compromise the system, enhancing security, transparency, and resilience.
